about_the_game:
Sami is busy celebrating his birthday party, when suddenly, the evil Albert VII appears in the sky riding his new airship and kidnaps all of Sami's friends! Rumors say that Albert VII plans to open a zoo on the moon... Could he be plotting to add Sami's friends to the exhibit?

Help Sami free his friends one by one as you visit all kinds of exciting and wondrous locations and get ready to run, jump, rail grind and, most of all, roll your way to victory!

This DEMO contains the following:

  • Five fun levels lasting between 30-40 minutes of gameplay in total

  • Lots of collectibles!

  • Sami as a playable character (more characters will be playable in the final game)

  • New accessibility options, allowing you to choose how you want to play

  • Three languages: English, Spanish and Japanese (more in the final game)

  • New and exhilarating songs by returning composer Evader Music

Super Sami Roll is not your standard 3D platformer series, these are rolling-physics based platformers! Movement is free-form and expressive, allowing for unique playstyles and precise control as you navigate your way through each of the challenging levels on offer. Keep your momentum up by using Sami’s tongue to grapple and jump over dangerous obstacles and enemies, and sometimes even skip entire areas!

It's up to you to create your own path. Do you want to take it slow and enjoy the beautiful scenery, or do you want to discover all of the skips and tricks to be the fastest lizard possible?

Once again, it's time to ROLL!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650

short_description: A colorful 3D platformer with rolling-physics based movement. Sami and Vera are back and they brought new friends with their own unique abilities. Roll, grapple and bounce around like never before in this new epic adventure.
